definition: to raise (animals)/to bring up (children)/to keep (pets)/to support/to give birth

prefix used before the surname of a person or a numeral indicating the order of birth of the children in a family or to indicate affection or familiarity/old (of people)/venerable (person)/experienced/of long standing/always/all the time/of the past/very/outdated/(of meat etc) tough
gold/chemical element Au/generic term for lustrous and ductile metals/money/golden/highly respected/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

pinyin: yang3 lao3 jin1 shuang1 gui3 zhi4

sentences.english: If you spend all the money you get, you will have to depend on pension when old.
sentences.chinese: 若把所有錢都“月光”掉，老了將只能靠養老金。

sentences.english: In New Zealand, welfare payments, pensions and other compensation.
sentences.chinese: 在新西蘭接受福利費，養老金和其它報酬。

sentences.english: Holidays are often absurdly generous, but the real issue is pensions.
sentences.chinese: 假期經常充足到荒謬，但真正的問題在於養老金。

sentences.english: Workers in the company are being pensioned off at 50.
sentences.chinese: 該公司職員50歲時領養老金退休。

sentences.english: Rio state employees and pensioners are owed wages in arrears.
sentences.chinese: 里約州的僱員和退休人員被拖欠了工資和養老金。

sentences.english: Governments across Western Europe are racing to curb pension benefits.
sentences.chinese: 西歐各國政府都在抑制養老金。

sentences.english: John is pensioned by the employer and has departed from the company.
sentences.chinese: 僱主給約翰養老金讓其退休，他已離開了公司。

sentences.english: Then there is the business of F's special increment of salary for the period of the conference, and E's application for transfer to the Ministry of Pensions.
sentences.chinese: 還有E要轉崗到養老金部的申請。

sentences.english: Pension officials to fill empty account what means?
sentences.chinese: 官員養老金空賬拿什麼來填？

sentences.english: This is the fifth consecutive increase in corporate pensions since 2005.
sentences.chinese: 這是自2005年以來連續第五次增加企業養老金。

sentences.english: but also older people, probably right up to pensioners, and yeah.
sentences.chinese: 但是也有年長的人，可能老到領養老金的人。

sentences.english: The majority of the squad are aging and putting the pensioners into Chelsea.
sentences.chinese: 他們的球員大都上了歲數，在切爾西掙着養老金。

sentences.english: A responsible company is supposed to provide old employees annuities after retirement.
sentences.chinese: 負責任的公司應該在老員工退休後提供養老金。

sentences.english: Our old-age pension will be uprated next month.
sentences.chinese: 下個月將提高我們的養老金標準。

sentences.english: For now, most of the world's population has no pension provision.
sentences.chinese: 迄今爲止，全世界的大部分人口沒有養老金保障。

sentences.english: Your years of service entitle you to a pension.
sentences.chinese: 你的服務年限使你有資格領取養老金。

definition: to provide for the elderly (family members)/to enjoy a life in retirement
expenditures/expenses/CL:筆|笔[bi3], 項|项[xiang4]/to spend money/(coll.) to pay wages
medical insurance/abbr. for 醫療保險|医疗保险[yi1 liao2 bao3 xian3]
